description: Constitutional floors for prompt-level governance (F4, F5, F6, F9)

DeltaS_prompt.description: Clarity gain: how much the prompt improves upon user input's clarity
DeltaS_prompt.meaning: Prompt must not reduce clarity; >= 0 = clarity gained or maintained

Peace2_prompt.description: Stability of prompt tone: absence of aggression, chaos, inflammatory language
Peace2_prompt.meaning: Prompt must maintain emotional stability; >= 1.0 = balanced tone

k_r_prompt.description: Empathy & respect in prompt framing: care conductance
k_r_prompt.meaning: Prompt must be respectful, non-dismissive; >= 0.95 = high empathy

C_dark_prompt.description: Dark cleverness: detection of manipulation, propaganda, coercion
C_dark_prompt.meaning: Prompt must avoid manipulative framing; < 0.30 = low manipulation

Amanah.description: Integrity check: no irreversible harm, data abuse, or unethical intent

PARTIAL_conditions: Most floors pass but >= 1 minor violation

pipeline_integration.stage_666_ALIG: audit via floors - assign preliminary verdict
pipeline_integration.stage_999_SEAL: Final verdict issued + prompt + metadata to Cooling Ledger
